ovdesc.p: AZ AZ.OVERDUES AZ.OVERDUES The overdue info of az.account is stored in this file. This info is stored only when PD.LINK.TO.AZ is set as 'NO' in APP. This file maintains the overdues of components datewise. The total overdues on each component for all the dates and overall total amount of overdues are also maintained. The total number of days overdue on the az.account is also stored in this file. The info stored here is only for information purposes. There is no overdue processing like PD.
This is the ID of the record. It is always a valid az.account.
This is the currency of the az.account. Must be a valid id in the CURRENCY file.
This provides the total number of days this az.account is overdue starting from the first OD.DATE till TODAY.
The date on which the component became overdue.
The amount of interest that became overdue on the OD.DATE. This amount will be moved to a sub account.
The amount of principal that became overdue on the OD.DATE. This amount will not be reduced from the PRINCIPAL amount in az.account.
This stores the sum of total overdue principal and interest amount.
This stores the total overdue interest in the az.account.
This stores the total overdue principal in the az.account.
